changeSet.createView: SELECT w.name AS workspace, b.id, b.name, b.description, b.abbreviation, b.datatype, b.min, b.max, b.enumerated, b.notes, up.name AS updated_by, b.version FROM unit b JOIN agency up ON b.updated_by = up.id LEFT JOIN ruleform.workspace_authorization wa ON b.workspace = wa.id LEFT JOIN ruleform.product w ON wa.defining_product = w.id
